title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 204.17 - Interference with lawful passage
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 204.17 - Interference with lawful passage

State Regulations

No fishing, kite flying, model airplane, toy boat, or vehicle
operation or other activity that might interfere with the lawful passage of any
boat, motor vehicle, aircraft, bicycle or pedestrian on, under or above any
authority facility shall be permitted. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
204.17

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
